name: Newborn Baby Infant Pettiskirt size 0-6M
description:
Princess Boutique brand new newborn size pettiskirt!
0-6m size 
This is 5 1/2 inches unstretched at the waist and close to 8 inches in length.   This is really a good fit for 0 - 6 month. The older she gets the lower it will fit - this model is 6 months and it fit more around the top of her diaper and not right at her waist.
Imagine giving this as a gift at a baby shower!!!  WOW and WOW!
Buy with confidence - we will do our best to be sure that you are 100% satisfied with this purchase!
MATERIALS: Skirt is 100% nylon chiffon
FEATURES: Easy pull-on style with adjustable waistband. 
SHIPPING: Please allow 1-2 weeks for skirts to be stitched and shipped unless I happen to have your choice in stock. I have quite a few solid colors in stock. I also DO combine shipping so look around and see if anything else catches your eye.

name: PETTISKIRT TANK TOP WITH 5 ROSES
description:
THIS TAK TOP IS TO MATCH PETTISKIRT.
WHITE COTTON TOP WITH 5 NYLON CHIFFON ROSES TO COMPLIMENT YOUR SKIRT.

name: PETTISKIRT FOR BIRTHDAY DRESS-UP
description:
These beautiful chiffon pettiskirts are the hottest thing around! Designed with a love of feminine vintage clothing, these timeless creations are soft, fun, original and of the highest quality. Pettiskirts are perfect for so many occasions! 
THERE ARE MATCHING DECORATED TOPS FOR ONLY $15. 
PETTISKIRTS Size ranges: Small (2-6) 12" long and waist 20-24" Medium(5-8) 14" long and waist 22-26" Large (6+) 16" long and waist 24-28" *estimated ship time is 1 weeks. If they are in stock, then immediately.
